TwistedElixir.NAME: Twisted Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: Make an enemy stronger and gain special #yrewards based on the size of its health when this is thrown.

HauntedGourdPotion.NAME: Haunted Gourd
DESCRIPTIONS: Discover a #ySkill #yPower and #yAttack which cost 0 this turn. Add a random #bCurse and #bSlimed to your hand.

SneckoExtractPotion.NAME: Snecko Extract
DESCRIPTIONS: Drink this and something #yextremely random will happen.

AntidotePotion.NAME: Antidote
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove all #bPoison #bFrail #bWeakness and #bVulnerable and heal for each point removed.
